The following samuraihistory poll is now closed.  Here are the 
final results: 


POLL QUESTION: I think the following genre(s) would be the most interesting 
for the Samurai Fiction contest (you may vote for multiple 
genres) 

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- Horror, 5 votes, 7.69%  
- Sci-fi, 5 votes, 7.69%  
- Comedy, 5 votes, 7.69%  
- Drama, 3 votes, 4.62%  
- Historically accurate fiction, 10 votes, 15.38%  
- What If alternate history, 9 votes, 13.85%  
- Tragedy, 3 votes, 4.62%  
- Romance, 3 votes, 4.62%  
- Action/Adventure, 9 votes, 13.85%  
- Fantasy, 5 votes, 7.69%  
- Crossover fiction (including characters from other stories, movies, etc), 2 votes, 3.08%  
- Mystery, 2 votes, 3.08%  
- Twilight Zone, 0 votes, 0.00%  
- Ghost Story, 2 votes, 3.08%  
- Pulp Fiction, 2 votes, 3.08%
